_sText:
Back in 2016 I started 2 things, studying at a university and working on a map. You see I had just figured out how to deal with problems in Hammer, this essentially allowed me to make bigger, more complex maps. And I wanted to put my skills and efforts to the test... So i took an old idea I had for 1.6 and made these monsters of maps...Needless to say I learned alot, made several prefabs in the process and gained a massive headache in attempting to bend Hammer to my will...

The alternate pack contains Wintermaze_2016_VX map wich was my original vision for this project, well almost. Certain things required compromise, such as the helicopter, that needed to stay as is. 

ABOUT THE MAP PACK: 

Alternate pack is basically what it says. Alternate versions that slightly deviate from the original 2016 map pack versions. 
Player count is mostly 20vs20, thou for VX it might be less. 

In total the map pack contains 4 maps (Originally I wanted 5, but seeing as I couldn't figure out surf maps, I gave up on the idea of surf_Wintermaze_2016)

If you're a simple individual who just wants a simple fight between friends V0 might be the map for you.  If the idea of a maze at the center is not your cup of tea, try out the Winterhill map, same concept, but no maze and no spawnhouses, just a hill with a few obsticles. 
If you want something complex with a degree of crazieness to it, try the VX map, you can fly a helicopter, blow up a nuclear reactor and flood the tunnel system, drowning anyone unfortunate enough to get trapped in there. 
If you like zombies, I made a ZM version as well. 

These maps can be classified under the "Fight yard" sub category. Reason why they're called "aim" is because when I published the first few maps I was told that "aim maps" are different. 

All maps have a functioning minimap. 

All maps have a functioning minimap on the top right, so you don't get lost, VX has a minimap with 2 layers that also works underground. 

Final words: 

VX is the crown jewel of this collection, it is ALMOST what I had in mind when I started making these maps. It is complex, large, crazy, designed for fun and is the final form of all other maps here. Hope it doesn't dissapoint. 

IF you find any bugs, please let me know.
